homeAbout.header: Since 1994, Curating Indonesia's Finest Premium Carpets
homeAbout.paragraph1: With more than three decades of experience, Al-Jabbar Carpets stands among Indonesia's most trusted destinations for premium carpets and permadani.
homeAbout.paragraph2: Every piece in our collection is handpicked from world-renowned artisans and manufacturers across Iran, Turkey, Pakistan, Afghanistan, Kashmir, Europe, and the United States.

about.heading: About Us
about.paragraph1: Al-Jabbar Carpets has been a trusted name in the carpet industry since 1994. With decades of experience and expertise, we have built a reputation for delivering excellence in every aspect of our service.
about.paragraph2: Our journey began with a simple vision: to bring world-class carpets to Indonesian homes and businesses. Today, we stand as one of Indonesia's premier carpet retailers, offering an extensive collection that spans traditional handwoven masterpieces to contemporary machine-made designs.
about.paragraph3: We work directly with master craftsmen and renowned manufacturers from Iran, Turkey, Pakistan, Afghanistan, Kashmir, and beyond. Each piece in our showroom tells a story of heritage, artistry, and dedication to quality.
about.paragraph4: Whether you're furnishing a home, office, hotel, or place of worship, Al-Jabbar provides personalized consultation to help you find the perfect carpet that matches your vision and budget. Our commitment extends beyond the saleâ€”we offer professional installation, maintenance guidance, and repair services to ensure your investment lasts for generations.
